{{Big Brother endgame | hmpage = Housemates | seriesname = Big Brother Brasil | series = Season 2 (2002) | previous = Big Brother Brasil 1 | next = Big Brother Brasil 3 | housemates = Housemates | image = | imagebg = #000 | start = May 14, 2002 | end = July 23, 2002 | hm1 = Rodrigo | hm1-enter = Day 1 | hm1-exit = Day 71 | hm1-stat = winner | hm2 = Manuela | hm2-enter = Day 1 | hm2-exit = Day 71 | hm2-stat = runner | hm3 = Cida | hm3-enter = Day 1 | hm3-exit = Day 69 | hm3-stat = evic | hm4 = Thyrso | hm4-enter = Day 1 | hm4-exit = Day 64 | hm4-stat = evic | hm5 = Tarciana | hm5-enter = Day 1 | hm5-exit = Day 57 | hm5-stat = evic | hm6 = Fabricio | hm6-enter = Day 1 | hm6-exit = Day 50 | hm6-stat = evic | hm7 = ThaÃ­s | hm7-enter = Day 1 | hm7-exit = Day 43 | hm7-stat = evic | hm8 = MoisÃ©s | hm8-enter = Day 1 | hm8-exit = Day 36 | hm8-stat = five | hm9 = Jeferson | hm9-enter = Day 1 | hm9-exit = Day 29 | hm9-stat = evic | hm10 = Fernando | hm10-enter = Day 1 | hm10-exit = Day 22 | hm10-stat = evic | hm11 = Tina | hm11-enter = Day 1 | hm11-exit = Day 15 | hm11-stat = evic | hm12 = Rita | hm12-enter = Day 1 | hm12-exit = Day 8 | hm12-stat = evic | legendwinner = Winner | legendrunner = Runner Up | legendevic = Evicted | legend5 = Big Boss Winner }} '''''Big Brother Brasil 2''''' was the second season of '''''Big Brother Brasil''''' which premiered May 14, 2002 with the season finale airing July 23, 2002 on the [[Rede Globo]] [[television network]]. The show was produced by [[Endemol|Endemol Globo]] and presented by news reporter [[Pedro Bial]] and directed by Jose Bonifacio Brasil de Oliveira. The prize award was R$500,000 without tax allowances. The winner was 32 year-old cowboy Rodrigo Leonel from [[RibeirÃ£o Preto]], [[SÃ£o Paulo]]. ==Overview== This was the second season of the show to air in the same year and the only in the show's history to air during the winter in [[South America]]. The season lasted 71 days an increase of one week over the previous season. Instead of the Final Three, this season was a Final Two facing the public vote at the Finale Night. ===Reunion Show=== The reunion was hosted by [[Pedro Bial]] and aired on July 28, 2002. All the former housemates attended. The men had choose two women (the women would do the same with the men) to compete for a spot in the final vote for the "Big Boss Prize". Rita and MoisÃ©s (who won the their rounds against ThaÃ­s and Fabricio with 65% and 84% of the votes respectively) competed in the final vote. MoisÃ©s ended up winning the "Big Boss Prize" which awarded R$50,000. He beat out Rita with 79% of the fans' vote.[http://bbb.globo.com/BBB2/0,6993,BIL352694-1765,00.html MoisÃ©s derrota Rita e leva os R$ 50 mil] ==Housemates== (ages stated at time of contest) {| class="wikitable" |- ! The Head of Household vote (casted in front of the other housemates) automatically nominate one housemate from eviction.
